ratings.comment: I wish she was a more engaging lecturer. Every lecture and example she gave in class was taken directly from the textbook, making going to class useless, except that attendance counts for 10% of your grade. She seems like an interesting person, but she's not an interesting lecturer.

Jean is a very intelligent professor. This can often scare students because it seems like she is talking at a really high level. Go to her office hours or talk to her after class, she is great at explaining and will respect you for it. She wants everyone to do well.
ridiculously easy class in general although it requires those stupid 'clickers' to monitor attendance by requiring you to electronically answer questions in class

Ridiculous. Nothing in the lectures pertain to test material. My TA, as a graduate student said he wouldn't want to take our tests. Discussion is easy but doesn't pertain to anything you do in lecture. This class destroyed my GPA.

Bahr's spastic lectures were really hard for me to sit through. This class is mostly about your memorization abilities.  If you remember a single crystal structure shown on one slide out of hundredsm you'll do fine on the midterms. Not reccomended unless you absolutely love geology.

Environmental Geology was not a particularly fun class for me. Bahr's lectures were fairly clear, but during midterms I questioned whether I was in the right room. The tests do not correlate well with the important concepts (or even details) of the class, making it a challenge. Bahr is obviously enthused about geology, but it didn't spread.

her lectures are extremely boring and completely unrelated to the information she expects you to know for the exams. She's useless but you have to go because she uses the CPS pads to keep attendance and participation.

I was struggling with some health problems this sem. & missed a lot of class the first month. Professor Bahr was really understanding. She met with me to go over material and even gave me an extension on taking the first exam. I like that the lectures are posted online for further study. The discussion sec. assignments are not overly difficult

worst professor i've had.  does not lecture effectively and asks really specific questions that dont pertain to main concepts on exams.  bounces around in front of lecture hall, so is really hard to pay attention too.  i would not recommend this class to anyone.
She expects a lot from her students but she, I feel, really takes an interest in our progress. She wants to help you get through her classes and do well.
thought this woman was going to be good because she has high energy but she's a nut.  terrible professor.  asks completely random questions on exams that were never even discussed in class.
